roles.name: Director
roles.text: Take two cards from the deck.

roles.name: Newscaster
roles.text: Pay 1 credit and take three cards from the deck.

roles.name: Producer
roles.text: Take one card from the deck and one from a target (targetâ€™s choice). (C)

roles.name: Reporter
roles.text: Take one card from the deck and 1 credit.

roles.name: Writer
roles.text: Take one card from the deck. After looking at the card, may pay 1 credit to take one more card from the deck (repeatable).

roles.name: Banker
roles.text: Take 3 credits.

roles.name: Capitalist
roles.text: Take 4 credits. Other players can then also claim to be a Capitalist. Once all challenges are resolved, pay 1 credit to every other surviving Capitalist.

roles.name: Farmer
roles.text: Take 3 credits and give 1 credit to another player.

roles.name: Speculator
roles.text: Double your credits (max. 5). If successfully challenged, return extra credits to the treasury and pay challenger your initial amount.

roles.name: Spy
roles.text: Take 1 credit and another action.

roles.name: Crime Boss
roles.text: Choose a target. Target can give you 2 credits to end turn. Otherwise, pay 5 credits to make target lose a life.

roles.name: General
roles.text: Pay 5 credits to all other targeted players lose a life. (C)

roles.name: Guerilla
roles.text: Pay 4 credits to make target lose a life. (C)

roles.name: Judge
roles.text: Give 3 credits to target to make target lose a life. If target counteracts, she keeps the 3 credits. (C)

roles.name: Mercenary
roles.text: Pay 3 credits to place Disappear token on a target. Target loses a life at the end of their next turn. (C)

roles.name: Communist
roles.text: Take up to 3 credits from richest player and give them to poorest player. (C)

roles.name: Customs Officer
roles.text: Take the two Tax tokens. Keep one and place the other on a role card. Other players must give you 1 credit before claiming the chosen role.

roles.name: Foreign Consular
roles.text: Take the two Treaty tokens. Keep one and give the other to another player. You cannot target each other (including with coups).

roles.name: Intellectual
roles.text: If you lose a life, you may claim to be Intellectual to take 5 credits. If successfully challenged, lose another life. If unsuccessfully challenged, challenger loses a life.

roles.name: Lawyer
roles.text: When another player is eliminated, you may take all their credits.

roles.name: Missionary
roles.text: If you lose a life (except in a coup), you may claim to be a Missionary to take one card from the deck. If successfully challenged, lose another life. If unsuccessfully challenged, challenger loses a life.

roles.name: Peacekeeper
roles.text: Take 1 credit and the Peacekeeping token. You cannot be targeted while you have the token (coups against you are still possible).

roles.name: Politician
roles.text: Take up to 2 credits from target. (C)

roles.name: Priest
roles.text: All other players give you 1 credit. (C)

roles.name: Protestor
roles.text: Pay 2 credits and choose a target. Another player can then pay 3 credits to make the target lose a life. (C)
